query: SELECT id, name, code, location, ownerName, DATE_FORMAT(startDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as startDate, DATE_FORMAT(endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as endDate, status FROM projects WHERE name LIKE '%ทดสอบ%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33MDJNP9oQHNu88.9be2e504806b --database XGUfRkFw3wTJbZrCqsFJBu --execute SELECT id, name, code, location, ownerName, DATE_FORMAT(startDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as startDate, DATE_FORMAT(endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as endDate, status FROM projects WHERE name LIKE '%ทดสอบ%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

rows.name: โครงการทดสอบ Edit
rows.ownerName: คุณทดสอบ ระบบ
